DOC.brief_summary: This study aim implement new family-based health behavior community program increase time spent outdoors physical activity among Singapore child age 6 12 year 1-year randomize clinical trial . 300 child 250 family randomly assign either family-based intervention intervention . The family-based intervention comprises structure weekend outdoor activity organize National Parks incentives child wear pedometer increase daily step . Families meet monthly step outdoor activity goal receive range prize incentive . Both group receive brochure National Myopia Prevention Program physical activity . The success intervention evaluate light meter , 7-day outdoor diary , questionnaire document outdoor time myopia ; well pedometer step , walk test , body mass index . A community-based intervention develop improve health Singapore child increase outdoor time physical activity prevent myopia obesity .
DOC.brief_title: Trial Novel Family-Based Intervention Increase Outdoor Time Fitness
DOC.detailed_description: To develop , implement , evaluate novel incentive-based family intervention increase time spent outdoors physical activity among child age 6 12 year 1-year randomize controlled trial .
DOC.criteria: Children 6 12 year age know health problem prevent stay outdoors walk physical activity include long Singapore citizen permanent resident . Both myopic nonmyopic child include Children medical condition Type 1 diabetes , severe asthma , cancer mental illness exclude .
